name: Little Octopus
description:
Take control of your very own reversible octopus plushie!

How high can you bounce? Tap to close the platforms and spring your reversible octopus higher and higher, time your bounces perfectly to reach the greatest heights.

Collect gems to unlock new skins and faces for your octopus. Your reversible octopus plush is customisable inside and out, choose new colours and faces to reflect your mood as you flip & reverse your octopus with each bounce!
